attributes.action: Paganism is the traditional and original belief system of Britain, it should be recognised as a religion once more
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Paganism is a religion that was the backbone of british society for thousands of years, yet people are unwilling to accept us as a part of modern scoiety! We should be recognised as a national religion. Every year there are more of us. please let us be again.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Paganism is the traditional and original belief system of Britain, it should be recognised as a religion once more."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page12020.asp

Prime Minister's Office
